BlogLines account

Questions to Ask an Employer

  • What kind of work will I be doing? Web programming, software programming, both? Working with customers?
  • How many people work at Mintel, both in Chicago and globally?
  • What kind of a team will I be a part of?
  • I see on the description that you like .NET, but also stress open-source technologies. Do you run Linux on any/many machines? Do you use Mono at all?
  • Patrick van Staveren
  • trick@vanstaveren.us
